Bid history Username Email Bid amount Skip to content Submit Close search Search Cart Currency AED AFN ALL 3 Forks Saddlery Saddles Three Forks Roper Merrill Barrel Saddle Three Forks Breakaway Roper Three Forks Ultimate Roper Sue Smith Barrel Saddles Baseline Series Saddles New & Used Saddles 3 Forks Saddlery Pads Menu Ortho-Roper Pad Ultimate Roper Pad All-Around Pad Original Roper Pad Shop Shop Menu Accessories Clothing Hats Gifts Customizable Chinks & Chaps Tack Ropes Seat Shrinker Contact Three Forks Saddlery and Neil Merrill have been producing the revolutionary Merrill Barrel Pad for over 10 years. More recently, we have added the Three Forks Ortho-Roper, Ultimate Roper, and the All-Around Saddle Pads. These signature, seamless pads are built with laminated contoured construction for a superb fit. A memory foam top allows the pad to thin out and disperse pressure evenly while the bottom foam layer is a full rebound material to accept shock at every stride. The advanced design of these pads allows for the bridging of technology and a hand-crafted product that offers many orthopedic benefits. All styles come equipped with your choice of either a hospital grade felt or neoprene bottom. Testimonials "Amazing folks! So helpful! Very knowledgeable!" Stephanie L. "Joe is very knowledgeable and friendly. Never a salesman just a helpful horseman and neighbor!" Shannon M. "Very cool store...real working saddlery." T. R. Hand-Crafted Saddles Shop our extensive collection of saddles: new & used. Our custom-made saddles are a popular selection for the local rancher, equine enthusiast, and for those in the rodeo circuit. If you are interested in a custom-made saddle, please contact us at: (866) 318-2371. thought: The extracted text does not immediately reveal any of the typical signs of a scam website. The products offered seem relevant to the domain name and there are no obvious claims of unusually low prices, large sums of money, or psychological manipulation. The testimonials and mention of hand-crafted products could suggest a legitimate business. However, there's a mention of a newsletter subscription that is © 2024, which is unusual since it's a future date. This could be a typo or an outdated piece of information, which warrants further investigation.

The hyperlinks extracted show that the website is powered by Shopify, which is a legitimate e-commerce platform. This reduces the likelihood of it being a scam. However, being on a legitimate platform does not guarantee that the store itself is legitimate. To investigate further, I will check the WHOIS information to determine the legitimacy of the domain ownership.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain 3forkssaddlery.com was registered in 2000 and is set to expire in 2026. The use of a privacy service (Domains By Proxy, LLC) is not unusual for business owners wishing to protect their personal information. The domain has been updated in 2019, which is relatively recent. The existence of a long-term domain with an expiration date far into the future is a positive sign, often indicating a legitimate operation rather than a scam. The information so far does not conclusively indicate a scam, but it's important to verify the business's reputation and any customer feedback to ensure its legitimacy further.

thought: The search results provide customer reviews and information about Three Forks Saddlery. The reviews seem positive, mention repairs and quality of work, and there's a history of the business being mentioned since 1973. Yelp, Facebook, and TripAdvisor are legitimate platforms where customers share their experiences, which supports the credibility of the business. The mention of a physical address and a long-standing operation since 1947 are also strong indicators of legitimacy. I now know the final answer. After analyzing the information gathered, I conclude that https://3forkssaddlery.com/ does not exhibit the characteristics of a scam website.

observation.reason: The website has positive customer reviews a long-standing business history and is associated with legitimate platforms such as Shopify. The domain has been registered for a long period and WHOIS information does not indicate anything suspicious. There are no signs of unusually low prices unrealistic money claims or other common scam characteristics.
